chapter.title: Guess The Number
chapter.para: This is a really simple "Guess The Number" game. The computer picks a random number between zero and any number you tell it. You then try to guess the number, and the computer will give you hints.
chapter.screen: Guess The Number! ---- I can guess a number between 1 and any number you give me. What's the highest number I should pick? 10 Ok, I will guess a number between 1 and 10 Ok, guess the number! 5 Too high. Try again! Ok, guess the number! 3 Too high. Try again! Ok, guess the number! 2 You got it!
